src:
Unai Emery: Imbang bukan Hasil yang Adil untuk Arsenal
03 Nov 2019, 02:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Arsenal, Unai Emery mengaku kecewa dengan hasil imbang yang diraih timnya melawan Wolverhampton. Emery percaya bahwa timnya seharusnya bisa mengamankan tiga poin di laga tersebut.
Arsenal kembali gagal memetik kemenangan di pekan ke 11 EPL musim ini. Menjamu Wolverhampton, tim asal London Utara itu hanya mampu bermain imbang dengan skor 1-1.
Di pertandingan tersebut, Arsenal unggul terlebih dahulu melalui gol Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang. Namun Raul Jimenez mampu memaksa tim London Utara itu berbagi angka setelah ia mencetak gol di babak kedua.
Emery mengaku kecewa timnya gagal mengamankan poin penuh di laga tersebut. "Ya, kami kecewa dengan hasil ini, namun yang terpenting adalah para pemain kami sudah mencoba dan bekerja keras," ujar Emery yang dikutip Football London.

Baca komentar lengkap pelatih asal Spanyol itu di bawah ini.
text:
Unai Emery: Draw is not a Fair Result for Arsenal
Nov 3 2019, 02:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal manager Unai Emery said he was disappointed with the draw achieved by his team against Wolverhampton. Emery believes that his team should be able to secure three points in the match.
Arsenal failed to reap victory in Week 11 of the EPL this season. Entertaining Wolverhampton, the team from North London was only able to draw with a score of 1-1.
In that match, Arsenal took the lead through Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang's goal. But Raul Jimenez was able to force the North London team to share points after he scored in the second half.
Emery said he was disappointed his team failed to secure full points in the match. "Yes, we are disappointed with this result, but the most important thing is that our players have tried and worked hard," Emery was quoted as saying by Football London.

Read the full comments of the Spanish coach below.
